text: Onsen Egg Promise Day 14 + furniture bubble tracker — maps for Day 1–5, Day 6+, and the snowman bubbles keep the hunt organized.
Feb 12 haul: Fluorite Plot 2, Roaming Oak Plot 5, Vanya's stall egg, and the cracked egg furniture at the lifeguard shack. Keep the loop steady and the snowman bubbles follow suit.
Collab CP Day 1 is live—follow the Heartopia account, repost, and check the raffle link for a chance at e-money and official merch!
My basic little home in #Heartopia is a work in progress—still a cozy cabin but I can feel it growing with new gear and the upcoming collab vibes.
